title: Quick Bill Splitter v1.0.6
description:
Description
Welcome ,
Did you went out with some friends to a restaurant ?
Its time for the bill ?
Now with this tool no need to be mathematic. The right tool for you is quick bill splitter
You can give the the total bill amount , the total drinks amount , the percent of tip , the total guests , the total people that drink , and after that you get all the results in real time (No other click needed).
* easy
* frendly
* real time results
* free
An easy Bill Splitter & tip calculator Gives directly results about what to pay.
see video bellow , how it works
for any suggestion , send us email to improve it.
